name: Thermodynamic Flux
description:
you are just one little man that needs to find his way through the mountain caves to the other side. But life is never that easy a maze awaits you with ice walls and other lovely things blocking your way maybe a fire weapon can melt the walls. And some how I need to figure out how to get rid of the ice blocks cover the small lake.

controls

Keyboard

wasd  / arrows - To move

space   - Jump

esq -  Pause Menu

right ctrl - Shot

left shift - run

1 key -  move forward through weapons

2 key  - move backwards Through weapons

Game pad

D pad -  to move

left and right -  Shoulder buttons

start  -Pause Menu

A - To Jump

B - To run

x - to shoot
